long_description: The compact Carson C6 lens cleaner is compact and easy to use. Its soft tip and dry cleaning formula wipe away smudges, grime and fingerprints with ease. Soft, natural-hair brush on the other end efficiently removes dust. The Carson C6 lens cleaner is ideal for cleaning lenses on binoculars, scopes, camcorders and cameras.
short_description: The compact Carson C6 lens cleaner is compact and easy to use. Its soft tip and dry cleaning formula wipe away smudges, grime and fingerprints with ease.
